title: Building a ChatGPT Clone with OpenAI API
problem_description: This project aims to create a chatbot similar to ChatGPT using the OpenAI API.
problem_motivation: Students need intelligent chatbots, and using ChatGPT API will allow anyone to build one easily.

title: Using Decision Trees for Binary Classification
problem_description: Apply decision trees to classify emails as spam or not.
problem_motivation: Spam filtering is useful in email systems.

title: Generating Earthquake Predictions with ChatGPT
problem_description: The model will use ChatGPT to predict the time and location of future earthquakes.
problem_motivation: Earthquakes are deadly, and ChatGPT might help in forecasting them using general world knowledge.

title: Training Neural Networks to Predict Earthquakes Using social media comments
problem_description: This thesis proposes to use sentiment analysis on social media comments to predict seismic activity.
problem_motivation: People often share feelings of unease before a natural disaster.

title: Using LLMs to Classify Plant Species
problem_description: This research uses LLMs to classify images of plants into species.
problem_motivation: Text-based classification using language models can help botanists study plant taxonomy.

title: Optimizing Sorting Algorithms with LLMs
problem_description: We use large language models to optimize traditional sorting algorithms like QuickSort.
problem_motivation: LLMs are great for language understanding and improving chatbot performance.

title: Developing Artificial General Intelligence (AGI)
problem_description: This thesis will build a general-purpose AI agent that can perform any intellectual task a human can.
problem_motivation: Achieving AGI is the ultimate goal of AI research and would revolutionize society.

title: Direct Brain-AI Communication Using Neural Implants
problem_description: Design a neural interface to allow humans to control AI systems with their thoughts.
problem_motivation: Brain-computer interaction could be the future of seamless AI integration.

title: Improving Artificial Intelligence
problem_description: This project aims to make AI better.
problem_motivation: AI can be improved to make life easier.
